title: Google Images
text: You can add an image to your spreadsheet using Google Image Search via "Image in cell."

title: Inserting a Chart
text: Inserting a chart is a different action in Google Sheets than inserting an image. A chart can be built directly in Google Sheets based on the visualization the user is looking for.

title: Image in Cell
text: Use "Image in cell" if you want your image to be located in a specific cell on your spreadsheet, which will not move around.

title: Over Cell
text: Without being associated to a specific cell, inserting an image over cells places it freely in the spreadsheet as a visual element.
